text: Disraeli is a 1929 American historical drama movie directed by Alfred E. Green and is the third version of the 1911 play of the same name by Louis N. Parker. It stars George Arliss, Doris Lloyd, Joan Bennett, Florence Arliss, Anthony Bushell and was distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures. It was nominated 3 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 1930. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1929 drama movies Category:1920s historical movies Category:1920s American drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Alfred E. Green Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies set in England Category:Movies set in the 1870s
title: Disraeli (movie)
